title: Deal with the Devil

The thought of you ruling the Nine Hells isn't comforting. You'd make an excellent Archdevil Supreme. How can you be confident in using the Crown where Karsus failed? Why didn't you seize the crown earlier? I'll take the crown and wield its power myself.

Choose the third option, and Raphael states his immortal nature prevents failure. Reply with:

If you're incapable of failing, why couldn't you obtain the Crown before? The notion of you ruling the Nine Hells isn't
